scripts.deploy-tellor: node scripts/deploy-prep.js mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ themandalore/tellor-dispute-v2
scripts.deploy-main: node scripts/deploy-prep.js mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ skuhlmann/tellor-playground
scripts.deploy-rinkeby: node scripts/deploy-prep.js rinkeby && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ themandalore/tellor-dispute-v2-rinkeby
